name: The Call (itch) (DevinneM, David Fang, avarii)
description:
Life in a city is loud, chaotic, and nonstop. Whether it's cars honking or people chatting, noise is abundant and peace is a luxury. We all need the time away, and the trails may be the answer we've been longing for. Walk through nature and connect to fellow hikers who finally got away and answered the call. 

Nature's Call is approximately ___ minutes. Window's Build Only!

Assets Used:
First Person Drifter by Ben Esposito
EVERYTHING Library by David OReilly
